explanations.machine learning: The paper introduces a deep learning model (TFT-ASRO) for predicting Sharpe ratios, which is a machine learning application.
explanations.deep learning: The model described, Temporal Fusion Transformer with Adaptive Sharpe Ratio Optimization (TFT-ASRO), is a deep learning model.
explanations.neural network: The TFT-ASRO model is based on neural network architectures, specifically transformers which are a type of neural network.
explanations.representation learning: The model leverages multiple data streams to capture the complete market state, implying it learns representations from the input data.
explanations.attention mechanism: The Temporal Fusion Transformer (TFT) part of the model name suggests the use of attention mechanisms, which are central to transformer architectures.
